front.title: An HTTP Status Code to Report Legal Obstacles

abstract.t: This document specifies a Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) status code for use when resource access is denied as a consequence of legal demands. Editorial Note (To be removed by RFC Editor before publication) Discussion of this draft takes place on the HTTPBIS working group mailing list (ietf-http-wg@w3.org), which is archived at [1]. Working Group information can be found at [2] and [3]; source code and issues list for this draft can be found at [4].
